titleInfo.title: Jacob McGavock Dickinson and fellow soldiers during Tennessee State Guard military field exercises

mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. mods.abstract: A group of Tennessee State Guardsmen are assembled near a field during military exercises.

Around two hundred members of the Tennessee State Guard assembled at the Traveler's Rest Arabian Stud Farm located near Franklin, Tennessee, on Del Rio Pike. The men, commanded by Brig. Gen. J. M. Dickinson, participated in a two-day field exercise. The men were all members of the Second Infantry Brigade. The event also included an officers' school.
